subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Joe Adams had his fourth punt return for a touchdown this season and No. 7 Arkansas matched a school record with its 11th victory, beating No. 11 Kansas State, 29-16, in the Cotton Bowl.
snippet: Joe Adams had his fourth punt return for a touchdown this season and No. 7 Arkansas matched a school record with its 11th victory, beating No. 11 Kansas State, 29-16, in the Cotton Bowl.
